name: Search Gurus
tag_list: seo, ppc, sem, social, smm, social-media, search-engine-optimization
overview:
A Mississauga / Toronto based company focused on Search Engine Friendly Web Design.

About the Search Gurus

In today’s dynamic and growing internet marketplace, Search Gurus Inc. is moving forward in the continually evolving industry of search engine optimization (SEO). The process of search engine optimization for business websites remains a relentless challenge. SEO is a chameleon… a shape-shifter. SEO best practices of mere months ago (although helpful) fail to meet current SEO requirements.

As our name implies, Search Gurus Inc. is comprised of a team of seasoned, capable and dedicated search engine optimization professionals. With over 25 years of collective industry experience; from search engine optimization to pay-per-click and banner advertising; from web design to online marketing and sales; from internet connectivity to domains and hosting, our team members have ‘been there’ and ‘done that’.
